con:testStep.name: PINSPayment_V2_0
con:testStep.con:description: This test case perform below operations Take test data from V_AUTH_USERINFO. Perform Straks 2.1 Payment CREATE using PINSPayment_V2_0. Verify various validation scenario's

con:config.con:query: SELECT USERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER,ACCOUNTTYPENAME, CURRENCYCODE,ACCOUNTROLENAME FROM V_AUTH_USERINFO WHERE BANKORGID IN ('${Properties#orgid}') AND MARKETTYPE='PM' AND CHANNEL = '${Properties#PaymentChannel}' AND ACCOUNTROLENAME IN ('Register', 'TransferDestination') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

con:elements.con:path: //Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/@fetchSize
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/@rowNumber
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/USERID[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNTNUMBER[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNTTYPENAME[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CURRENCYCODE[1]
//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNTROLENAME[1]
